name: stackshift
description: Reverse engineering toolkit for Cox Automotive applications. Transform any application into fully-specified, spec-driven codebase through 6-gear process. Auto-detects app type (Osiris, CMS, Generic) then choose route: Greenfield (tech-agnostic for migration) or Brownfield (tech-prescriptive for maintenance). Includes Gear 6.5 validation, code review, and coverage mapping.
